methods.Name: 3t 4 Granite 123k+ Xp/Hr

Videos.Title: Dear Sleeper's Tick perfect raw footage

Requirements: Desert ammy 4 or Hitpoints cape and Regen Bracelet
methods.Description: Using herb/tar to 3 tick granite for upwards of 130k/hr. You should use either Desert Amulet (4) or a combination of HP cape and Regen bracelet to survive the desert heat. Can be tricky to learn, so recommended that you give Aubury's guide a watch. If you're able to keep the cycle up your tier of pickaxe doesn't matter.

AdditionalInfo.Mechanics: Advanced explanation of 3 tick mining mechanics...

methods.Name: Motherlode Mine - 45k+ xp/hr
methods.Description: Unlock upper level > sack > outfit if you're doing MLM for xp. For efficiency, do MLM at 85+ until you get the outfit, then never go back.

methods.Name: Iron Ore - 80k xp/hr
methods.Description: You can 3 tick the 4 rocks to the north east in the Ardy location, this is a good option pre mining guild.

methods.Name: Volcanic mine
methods.Description: Volcanic mine is also the best alternative to 4g. Teams are slightly more AFK than alting VM, in return for lower xp/hr.

methods.Name: Zalcano
methods.Description: Doing Zalcano is the only way to get a crystal tool seed. Doing Zalcano in teams of 4 is best, as loot scales with your personal damage contribution to the kill.

methods.Name: 3t Gem Mining 110-115k xp/hr (21k banked Crafting xp/hr)
Requirements: Desert Amulet 4 or Stam Pool POH
methods.Description: Follow the route shown in the video for optimal xp rates. Use Vile Vigour when you are out of run. Tele to nardah to restore prayer/run when your run drains the second time.
